attributes.action: Stop the move for a 39th premiership fixture.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although claiming to be unanimously decided many premiership managers have already rubbished the idea, it will further clot up the crowded fixture list, it could possibly cost a team around 20 million if they were to lose out on a champions league place due to this and the seeding will be unfair.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
